actions.componentDescription: HubSpot is a CRM platform with all the software, integrations, and resources you need to connect marketing, sales, content management, and customer service.
actions.description: Create a contact with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard contacts is provided.
actions.name: createContact

properties.label: Simple Public Object Input For Create
properties.name: simplePublicObjectInputForCreate

actions.title: Create

actions.componentDescription: HubSpot is a CRM platform with all the software, integrations, and resources you need to connect marketing, sales, content management, and customer service.
actions.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{contactId}`. `{contactId}` refers to the internal object ID. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
actions.name: updateContact
actions.title: Update

triggers.description: Triggers when an event of the subscribed type happens inside HubSpot.

properties.description: The id of a Hubspot app used to register this trigger to. See the prerequisites documentation for more details about creating an app
properties.label: App Id
properties.name: appId

properties.description: The list of available event types for which you want to receive events.
properties.label: Event Type

properties.description: The name of property to listen for change events.
